snippet: In a speech that lasted more than an hour, Mr. Trump focused less on the issue of immigration than on dismissing those who criticized his earlier comments on the topic.
abstract: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump delivers longwinded speech in which he dismisses critics on both sides of political aisle and appeals to what he terms 'silent majority' of voters.

byline.contributor: Fernanda Santos and Kimberley McGee contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: In a speech that lasted more than an hour, Mr. Trump focused less on the issue of immigration than on dismissing those who criticized his earlier comments on the topic.

headline.main: Donald Trump Defiantly Rallies a New ‘Silent Majority’ in a Visit to Arizona
headline.print_headline: Trump Defiantly Rallies a New ‘Silent Majority’ in a Visit to a Border State
